author: odoo
comments: odoo arabic localization arabic countries saudi arabia   this initially includes chart accounts usa translated arabic   in future module include payroll rules me              encoding  utf 8        part odoo  see license file full copyright licensing details
content:
# -*- encoding: utf-8 -*-
# Part of Odoo. See LICENSE file for full copyright and licensing details.

{
    'name': 'Saudi Arabia - Accounting',
    'version': '1.1',
    'author': 'DVIT.ME',
    'category': 'Localization',
    'description': """
Odoo Arabic localization for most arabic countries and Saudi Arabia.

This initially includes chart of accounts of USA translated to Arabic.

In future this module will include some payroll rules for ME .
""",
    'website': 'http://www.dvit.me',
    'depends': ['account', 'l10n_multilang'],
    'data': [
        'data/account_chart_template_data.xml',
        'data/account.account.template.csv',
        'data/l10n_sa_chart_data.xml',
        'data/account_chart_template_data.yml',
    ],
    'post_init_hook': 'load_translations',
}
description: Odoo. Open Source Apps To Grow Your Business.
